posts.title: Albert Einstein Personal Genius Robot
posts.content: Stimulate your scientific interest by expanding your knowledge base with the Albert Einstein personal genius robot. He comes with built-in Wi-Fi, can chat with you, teach you science, manage your calendar, and can make over 50 life-like gestures.

posts.title: Old Fashioned Cocktail Kit
posts.content: Earn some man points by learning how to make the perfect old fashioned using this helpful cocktail kit. Apart from the easy to follow guidelines, the kit includes everything from an ice sphere mold to a stainless steel muddler, and even a garnishing tool.

posts.title: Ninja Star Coat Hook
posts.content: Give the bachelor pad a warrior’s touch by accessorizing with the ninja star coat hook. The star easily screws into the wall and provides a sturdy and convenient place to hang your coat while transforming the wall into a scene out of a Shanghai showdown.

posts.title: Probiotic Gummy Supplement
posts.content: Staying in great health is tastier than ever when you begin taking this probiotic gummy supplement. These chewy bite sized gummies feature a zesty tropical mango taste and are designed to support a healthy digestion and immune health.

posts.title: Princess Dress Blanket
posts.content: Now with the princess dress blanket, there’ll be no need for a fairy god mother if your little girl wants to look and feel like royalty. This lovely duvet features a regal and elegant dress emblazoned over the front and is complimented by a tiara pillow case.

posts.title: Grill Steam Brush
posts.content: Get a sparkling clean grill without the hassle of scrubbing for hours by using this grill steam brush to do the job. It uses the power of steam to easily scrub off tough stains and melted-on food so your grill stays looking like new.

posts.title: Floating Beer Pong Raft
posts.content: Keep the party raging while you cool off in the water with this floating beer pong raft. A must have for any summertime outing, it comes with a slew of cup holders, a convenient little cooler at the center, and doubles as a mattress in case you party too hard.

posts.title: Wine Siphoning System
posts.content: The wine siphoning system allows you to access your wine without the need to ever remove the cork – so you can drink wine by the glass instead of committing to the entire bottle – extending the life of your most valued wines.

posts.title: Emergency Piggy Bank
posts.content: In case of emergency, the emergency piggy bank probably won’t help you that much but it will get you out of a small jam. It’s modeled after a standard fire alarm and features a very breakable glass cover you can strike with a hammer any time you’re short on change.

posts.title: Stone Massage Slippers
posts.content: Receive a soothing foot massage with every step you take wearing these stone massage slippers. The soles are littered with strategically placed smooth stones  that are designed to give your bare feet a relaxing and detoxifying massage.

posts.title: Magnetic Spot Scrubber
posts.content: Give your glassware a real thorough cleaning with help from the magnetic spot scrubber. The scrubber’s innovative design allows you to get into those hard to reach places in order to get your glassware looking as new as the day you first bought it.

posts.title: Beer Bottle Style Baby Bottle
posts.content: Introduce your little one to the joys of happy hour from an early age using this beer bottle style baby bottle. Designed to look like a pint sized version of a frosty brew, the bottle is made from sturdy plastic and is complemented by a food grade silicone nipple.
